metadata.name: Restored Collection
metadata.description:
Relics thought to be lost have been found, and are now in the basement! Restored Items Pack is a collection of Team Compliance's mods restoring items, pickups, and more from Antibirth to Repentance, featuring 0 items and 0 pickups!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/fu8tO7l.png[/img]
[list] [*]0 collectibles to discover, ranging from items cut from Antibirth to items based on old design documents. [*]3 new heart pickups, each with their own abilities! [*]Ancient variations of already existing items, which function how they did before being changed. [*]A challenge [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/EDucsdc.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/OZNWMCq.png[/img] [url=https://github.com/Team-Compliance/RestoredMonsters]Restored Monsters Repository[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/OZNWMCq.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xK4Mor0.png[/img] [url=https://discord.gg/GdVnkV4Gwj]TBOI: Compliance Discord Server[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xK4Mor0.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/GmVPmG0.png[/img] [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEdAioGltx_hOsyDW57nvSw/featured]TBOI: Compliance YouTube[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/GmVPmG0.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/jBFg02x.png[/img] [url=https://twitter.com/ComplianceMods]TBOI: Compliance Twitter[/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/jBFg02x.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/MTKQKCX.png[/img]
